meanings.definition: Guidance or recommendations offered to help someone make a decision or solve a problem.
meanings.sent1: She always seeks advice from her teacher before starting a new project.
meanings.sent2: His father's advice was to study hard for the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent3: The advice from the wise owl led the lost squirrel back home.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was a beacon of light in the darkness of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The advice to follow the North Star guided them safely through the night.

meanings.definition: An opinion or suggestion about what someone should do.
meanings.sent1: I value your advice on which book to read next.
meanings.sent2: His advice to visit the museum turned out to be a great idea.
meanings.sent3: The advice to wear a hat on a sunny day was well-received.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was like a compass pointing towards success.
meanings.sent5: The advice to take deep breaths calmed her nerves before the speech.

meanings.definition: Information or a notice given to someone.
meanings.sent1: The weather forecast was good advice for planning the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The advice to arrive early for the meeting was helpful.
meanings.sent3: The advice about the traffic jam made him change his route.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was a signpost guiding them to the right path.
meanings.sent5: The advice to pack an umbrella saved them from getting wet in the rain.
